::Zardus::

A small smile flickers across Zardus's face as Lady Hawk extends a 
hand for a handshake.

"I would like to remain unique," he says to her, not taking the 
hand. "DNA samples will be in soon. You can get set up before they 
come in if you wish. I have some matters to take care of. If you'll 
exuse me, I must be going."

He turns around and walks off toward Squizzy's lab, which wasn't too 
far away.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk practically drools at seeing the lab. It was at least 
twice the
> size of the one shr had in the previous base. Her thoughts again 
extended to
> her father, she wished he were there now. She contained herself 
again
> remembering that this was a mission, not the time to be 
sentimental. "Thank
> you for your confidence in me Zardus, I just hope I can live up to 
your
> expectations." She extended her hand in mock friendship for his 
renewed
> faith in her abilities.
